author: benh
msg: Remove ~/.ssh/known_hosts because it gets polluted as you start/stop many clusters (new machines tend to come up under old hostnames)

author: benh
msg: Added a simple framework called mesos-submit that lets you launch a
process in the cluster and exits once it is launched. This is a way to
run schedulers in the cluster for example (by submitting a script which
starts up your scheduler). Usage is similar in spirit to mpiexec.
